price: Wͻka nso (kyerε agyidiefoͻ no) sε: “Sε mo yε nokwafoͻ ampa a, dabεn na saa bͻhyε no (bεba)?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
